Articles.Content:
i have just made a video of my 1st flight Kerbal Space Program

tell me what people think.

i have been playing this a lot more now and can get in to space my next task it to get to the moon

Oh man. I was like that once. We're all glad that we now have some experience under our belt. A few questions for you (not assuming you don't know the answers, just asking to see if anyone here can help you out). Have you worked out the difference between the ASAS and the SAS? Do you put monopropellant on your ships so the RCS thrusters work? Have you worked out rocket staging now (check out 'asparagus staging' if you haven't already, should help you get to the Mun)?

Great vid. Good luck shooting for the Mun.

Oh man. I was like that once. We're all glad that we now have some experience under our belt. A few questions for you (not assuming you don't know the answers, just asking to see if anyone here can help you out). Have you worked out the difference between the ASAS and the SAS? Do you put monopropellant on your ships so the RCS thrusters work? Have you worked out rocket staging now (check out 'asparagus staging' if you haven't already, should help you get to the Mun)?

Great vid. Good luck shooting for the Mun.

at the time i did not know the difference between the ASAS and the SAS but i think i now know but still not 100%.

asparagus staging i have just had a look at this so i now know what it is.

thanks for the feed back.
